message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_FV_DURATION
message.locale: Recurring activity cannot last longer than 1 day.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_FV_END_EMPTY
message.locale: End Date and Time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_FV_START_EMPTY
message.locale: Start Date and Time must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XFV_EMPTY
message.locale: Either a user or an organization must be entered for an activity.
Either a user or an organisation must be entered for an activity.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XFV_END_DATE_TIME
message.locale: The activity end date/time must not be before the start date/time.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XFV_LOCATION
message.locale: Either a location ID or a location name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_USERNOTINVITED
message.locale: %1s has not been invited to attend this activity.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_MAINTAIN_RIGHTS
message.locale: You do not have the maintenance rights for this activity.Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_VIEW_RIGHTS
message.locale: You do not have the view rights for this activity.Please contact your security administrator.
